# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Special Instructions

{{instructions}}

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in split(String(text)), r"\s+")
        new_word_length = length(newword(current_line, word)))
        
        if new_word_length + length(current_line) + 1 â‰¤ text_width
            current_line *= " " * new_word_length
            current_line *= word
        else
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    
    return lines
end

# Example
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla facilisi. Sed ut est euismod bibendum id nec lacus."

wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width=20)
formatted_output = join(wrapped_text, "\n\n")
println(formatted_output)
